concept.title: Index service recovery
concept.shortdesc: Index service recovery depends on the index coordinator and the client.

conbody.p: Recovery occurs under the following conditions:

ul.li: The indexer coordinator verifies the meta data and the restart of shared DCP connections (such as update and backfill).
Each indexer handles its own recovery at its own speed.
The client detects connection closures and restarts the connection (for example, if there is a projector, router, or key-value failure).
